author.organization: University of California, Santa Barbara (UCSB), Computer Research Laboratory

abstract.t: The former interface to the network for our 360-75 was replaced by a production unit similar to the NASA- AMES and USC versions. This controller went into operation 1 May 1972.
We would be pleased to hear of any difficulties network users encounter, while operating with UCSB, that might be related to this unit. Thank you.
